commentary: (VINa) ito paraṃ pana imesaṃ'y'eva ajjhattarūp'ādīnaṃ padānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ ajjhattarūpe'ti ajjhattaṃ upādinne rūpe'ti'ādi vuttaṃ, tattha ajjhattaṃ upādinne rūpe'ti attano hatth'ādibhede rūpe. bahiddhā upādinne'ti parassa tādisey'eva.
commentary_add: (VINa) ito paraṃ pana imesaṃ'y'eva ajjhattarūp'ādīnaṃ padānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ ajjhattarūpe'ti ajjhattaṃ upādinne rūpe'ti'ādi vuttaṃ, tattha ajjhattaṃ upādinne rūpe'ti attano hatthādibhede rūpe. bahiddhā upādinne'ti parassa tādisey'eva.
comment: we should discuss this, i'm not sure about it. please give more comments on your ideas.

commentary: (VINa) ito paraṃ pana imesaṃ'y'eva ajjhattarūp'ādīnaṃ padānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ ajjhattarūpe'ti ajjhattaṃ upādinne rūpe'ti'ādi vuttaṃ, tattha ajjhattaṃ upādinne rūpe'ti attano hatth'ādibhede rūpe. bahiddhā upādinne'ti parassa tādise'y'eva.
commentary_add: (VINa) ito paraṃ pana imesaṃ'y'eva ajjhattarūp'ādīnaṃ padānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ ajjhattarūpe'ti ajjhattaṃ upādinne rūpe'ti'ādi vuttaṃ, tattha ajjhattaṃ upādinne rūpe'ti attano hatthādibhede rūpe. bahiddhā upādinne'ti parassa tādiseyeva.

meaning_1: should be taken; should be collected
example_1: apattakassa na gāhetabbo. eten'eva upāyena yāva saṅghanavakā gāhetabbā. yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo, ayaṃ te, bhikkhu, patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo'ti.
example_1_add: apattakassa na gāhetabbo. eten'eva upāyena yāva saṅghanavakā gāhetabbā. yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo, ayaṃ te, bhikkhu, patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo'ti.
comment: To me it seems like it should just be "taken", not dstributed. You need to provide more sources if you are going to make up new meanings like this which aren't natural meanings.
comment_add: because it is done by pattaggāhāpaka

meaning_1: could be used (for); can be employed (as)
meaning_1_add: could be used; can be made use of
example_1: nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvā na kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na ajjhoharitabbaṃ, padīpe vā kāḷavaṇṇe vā upanetabbaṃ, aññena bhikkhunā kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na ajjhoharitabbaṃ.
example_1_add: nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvā na kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na ajjhoharitabbaṃ, padīpe vā kāḷavaṇṇe vā upanetabbaṃ, aññena bhikkhunā kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na ajjhoharitabbaṃ.
comment_add: context and NCPED, CPD see upaneti

meaning_1: binding; knee strap; cloth to clasp the knees
example_1: anāpatti, cīvaraṃ sibbetuṃ, āyoge, kāyabandhane, aṃsabandhake, pattatthavikāya, parissāvane, ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
example_1_add: anāpatti, cīvaraṃ sibbetuṃ, āyoge, kāyabandhane, aṃsabandhake, pattatthavikāya, parissāvane, ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
commentary: (VINa) āyoge'ti-ādīsu'pi nimitt'atthe bhummavacanaṃ, āyog'ādinimittaṃ viññāpentassa anāpattī'ti vuttaṃ hoti. (VVt) āyoge'ti āyogapatte.
comment_add: BMC suggest knee strap and Ven Brahmali - back-and-knee strap

construction:
na > a + citta > cittī + kata
na + cittīkata
construction_add:
na > a + citta > cittī + kata
na + cittīkata
example_1: hīnaṃ nāma nāmaṃ, avakaṇṇakaṃ, javakaṇṇakaṃ, dhaniṭṭhakaṃ, saviṭṭhakaṃ, kulavaḍḍhakaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma nāmaṃ.
example_1_add: hīnaṃ nāma nāmaṃ, avakaṇṇakaṃ, javakaṇṇakaṃ, dhaniṭṭhakaṃ, saviṭṭhakaṃ, kulavaḍḍhakaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma nāmaṃ.

example_1: anāpatti ekato uddisāpento, ekato sajjhāyaṃ karonto, yebhuyyena paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ bhaṇantaṃ opāteti, osārentaṃ opāteti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
example_1_add: anāpatti ekato uddisāpento, ekato sajjhāyaṃ karonto, yebhuyyena paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ bhaṇantaṃ opāteti, osārentaṃ opāteti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
commentary: (VINa) osārentaṃ opātetī'ti suttaṃ uccārentaṃ parisamajjhe parisaṅkamānaṃ evaṃ vadehī'ti tena saddhiṃ ekato'pi vadantassa anāpatti.
commentary_add: (VINa) osārentaṃ opātetī'ti suttaṃ uccārentaṃ parisamajjhe parisaṅkamānaṃ evaṃ vadehī'ti tena saddhiṃ ekatopi vadantassa anāpatti.

example_1: āpattipariyantā nāma āpattiyo pariggahitāyo honti, ettakāhi āpattīhi ārocetabbo'ti.
example_1_add: āpattipariyantā nāma āpattiyo pariggahitāyo honti, ettakāhi āpattīhi ārocetabbo'ti.

example_1: n'eva āpattipariyantā na kulapariyantā nāma āpattiyo ca apariggahitāyo honti, kulāni ca apariggahitāni honti, ettakāhi āpattīhi ettakesu kulesu ārocetabbo'ti.
example_1_add: n'eva āpattipariyantā na kulapariyantā nāma āpattiyo ca apariggahitāyo honti, kulāni ca apariggahitāni honti, ettakāhi āpattīhi ettakesu kulesu ārocetabbo'ti.

example_1: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajjhokāse vasitvā kālass'eva sen'āsanaṃ abhiharanti. addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū kālass'eva sen'āsanaṃ abhiharante.
example_1_add: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajjhokāse vasitvā kālass'eva sen'āsanaṃ abhiharanti. addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū kālass'eva sen'āsanaṃ abhiharante.

example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiyaṃ. im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti
example_1_add: idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiyaṃ. im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti
commentary: (VINt) (ṅa) vikappaṃ āpannan'ti (pārā. 643) idaṃ kho, āvuso, cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati, āyatañ'ca karotha vitthatañcā'ti-ādinā adhikaṃ vidhānaṃ āpannan'ti attho.

example_1: pariṇataṃ nāma dassāma karissāmā'ti vācā bhinnā hoti.
example_1_add: pariṇataṃ nāma dassāma karissāmā'ti vācā bhinnā hoti.
synonym: utta, udita, udīrita, ovādita, pabhāvita, pavutta, bhaṭṭha, bhaṇita, bhāsita, lapita, vutta, samudāciṇṇa
synonym_add: akkhātiāmantayati, ārocayati, āroceti, kathayati, katheti, pabrūti, pāvadati, pilapati, bravīti, brūtilapayati, vadati

example_1: pathavī nāma dve pathaviyo, jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavī.
example_1_add: pathavī nāma dve pathaviyo, jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavī.
commentary: (VIN) jātā nāma pathavī, suddhapaṃsu suddhamattikā appapāsāṇā appasakkharā appakaṭhalā appamarumbā appavālikā, yebhuyyenapaṃsukā, yebhuyyenamattikā. adaḍḍhā'pi vuccati jātā pathavī. yo'pi paṃsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho, ayam'pi vuccati jātā pathavī.
commentary_add: (VIN) jātā nāma pathavī, suddhapaṃsu suddhamattikā appapāsāṇā appasakkharā appakaṭhalā appamarumbā appavālikā, yebhuyyenapaṃsukā, yebhuyyenamattikā. adaḍḍhā'pi vuccati jātā pathavī. yo'pi paṃsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho, ayam'pi vuccati jātā pathavī.

example_1: pathavī nāma dve pathaviyo, jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavī.
example_1_add: pathavī nāma dve pathaviyo, jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavī.
commentary: (VIN) ajātā nāma pathavī, suddhapāsāṇā suddhasakkharā suddhakaṭhalā suddhamarumbā suddhavālikā appapaṃsukā appamattikā, yebhuyyenapāsāṇā, yebhuyyenasakkharā, yebhuyyenakaṭhalā, yebhuyyenamarumbā, yebhuyyenavālikā. daḍḍhā'pi vuccati ajātā pathavī. yo'pi paṃsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho, ayam'pi vuccati ajātā pathavī.
commentary_add: (VIN) ajātā nāma pathavī, suddhapāsāṇā suddhasakkharā suddhakaṭhalā suddhamarumbā suddhavālikā appapaṃsukā appamattikā, yebhuyyenapāsāṇā, yebhuyyenasakkharā, yebhuyyenakaṭhalā, yebhuyyenamarumbā, yebhuyyenavālikā. daḍḍhā'pi vuccati ajātā pathavī. yo'pi paṃsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho, ayam'pi vuccati ajātā pathavī.

meaning_1: should be given up; to be handed over; should be relinquished (to)
meaning_1_add: should be given up; to be handed over; should be relinquished (to)
example_1: tena bhikkhunā so patto bhikkhuparisāya nissajitabbo, yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo, ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo'ti, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
example_1_add: tena bhikkhunā so patto bhikkhuparisāya nissajitabbo, yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo, ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo'ti, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
commentary: (KVt) nissajjitabbo'ti ayaṃ me, bhante, patto ūnapañcabandhanena pattena cetāpito nissaggiyo, im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti nissajjitabbo.
commentary_add: (KVt) nissajjitabbo'ti ayaṃ me, bhante, patto ūnapañcabandhanena pattena cetāpito nissaggiyo, im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti nissajjitabbo.
